1.0.name: wordpress/tagthepress
1.0.description:
With this plugin, you will be able to use the Web service tagthe.net for your posts. Just click on Fetch tags and the title, content and optional excerpt of your post will be analyzed by tagthe.net in order to find words that could be useful as tags.

It currently works with English, German, French and Spanish content.
